pr_title: [DNM] Initial dev tools deployment issue fixes

timeline.message: Improve message for deployment creation getting skipped for existing thing group
Improve message for deployment creation getting skipped for existing thing group
Add current nucleus version as top level component to initial deployment in setup

timeline.bodyText: can you get the version from the config instead? That will help us in testing.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: We don't use the deploy dev tools option for testing do we?
replies.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText: No, but we should at some point.
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Taking nucleus name from config is not very helpful, if the current nucleus is a custom one and the dev tools deployment option is used along with it, this cli component will still bring the default nucleus so there will be conflict and it will fail anyway
replies.author: shaguptashaikh

timeline.message: Add current nucleus version as top level component to initial deployment in setup
Improve message for deployment creation getting skipped for existing thing group
